ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 33
ygData.msgSnippet: A fellow bard on Mith. Marr I guess petitioned about the Charisma Song yesterday night and was told that the bug fix is in the works for that song. Nothing
ygData.messageBody:
A fellow bard on Mith. Marr I guess petitioned about the Charisma Song
yesterday night and was told that the bug fix is in the works for that song.
Nothing more... it'll probably come soon.

Now if they would fix that song locking bug with weapons that trigger
special effects.

- Olan of the Freeport Raiders, Mith. Marr


-----

> Level 30 song.
> I know NOTHING about it, so anything you can help me out with would rock.
> Rolande, Drunken Bard of Povar.
> PS
> Is there a hangover song?
> Oh, also, is the Charisma Song working?
